title: Balance Pan Asian Grille
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Chinese, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Like an Asian Chipotle. Regular menu features vegan potstickers and edamame as starters with build a bowl options using tofu as protein. With choices of starches and vegetable mixes with different sauces some of which are vegan. On seasonal menu, currently there are several vegan options, mushroom soup made with garlic broth, portobello mushroom tacos, and Wok in the Park bowl which features tofu, mixed vegetables, rice, and a vegan sauce. Also has several options for gluten free. Another location in Maumee area.
